title: Add /health endpoint
objective: Add a /health HTTP endpoint that returns {"status":"ok"} and 200.

steps.text: Open app.py and locate the Flask app instance
Create a new handler function health() that returns JSON

patch:
diff --git a/app.py b/app.py
index 123..abc 100644
--- a/app.py
+++ b/app.py
@@ -40,6 +40,12 @@
 def index():
     return "Hello"
+
+@app.route('/health')
+def health():
+    return jsonify({"status":"ok"}), 200
